entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
